sections.title: Defining Artificial Intelligence
sections.content: This section provides an overview of what constitutes artificial intelligence, tracing its historical roots and current definitions.

sections.title: AI in Everyday Life
sections.content: Exploring how AI has seamlessly integrated into various aspects of daily life, including common applications and technologies.

sections.title: Historical Milestones
sections.content: A journey through the key historical milestones in the development of AI, highlighting significant breakthroughs and inventions.

sections.title: Recent Advancements
sections.content: An examination of recent advancements in AI technology, focusing on cutting-edge research and innovations.

sections.title: Types of Algorithms
sections.content: This section details the various types of AI algorithms, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

sections.title: Algorithm Selection and Application
sections.content: Discusses how to choose the right algorithm for specific AI tasks and the practical applications of these algorithms.

sections.title: Introduction to Deep Learning
sections.content: An overview of deep learning, explaining how it differs from traditional machine learning and its significance in AI.

sections.title: Neural Networks Explained
sections.content: This section delves into the structure and function of neural networks, including their layers and how they process information.

sections.title: Moral Implications of AI
sections.content: Examines the moral implications of AI development and deployment, including potential societal impacts.

sections.title: AI and Privacy
sections.content: Discusses privacy concerns related to AI, focusing on data collection, processing, and the importance of safeguarding personal information.
